Headline: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland Temporary Reroute at Narragansett/Wellington
ShortDescription: 86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are rerouted via Narragansett, Diversey, Austin, Belmont and Narragansett due to street blockage near Narragansett/Wellington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Narragansett, Diversey, Austin, Belmont and Narragansett: due to street blockage near Narragansett/Wellington.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #29 State Temporary Reroute near State/45th
ShortDescription: 29 State buses temp. rerouted NB: State, 45th, Indiana. 43rd and State; SB Sate, 43rd, Michigan, 45th and State: near State/45th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#29 State  buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near State/45th due to fire department activity near State/45th.

Northbound buses will operate via State, 45th, Indiana, 43rd and State including the normal route streets.

Southbound buses will operate via State, 43rd, Michigan, 45th and State.

Allow extra travel time.
